function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through shared living spaces and crowded environments","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks within settlements","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, reducing overcrowding, and promoting individual space and ventilation","Technologies":"Air purification systems, touchless fixtures, IoT-based monitoring","People":"Residents, occupants, and visitors of built environments","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate privacy and accessibility in living spaces","Impact":"Compromised privacy and inability to meet the needs of occupants","Mitigation":"Designing flexible layouts, integrating privacy features, and ensuring accessibility for all users","Technologies":"Smart home systems, adaptable furniture, assistive technology","People":"Occupants of different ages and abilities","Owner":"Interior designers, architects, and building developers"},{"Description":"Lack of ergonomic and safety considerations in living spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of accidents, injuries, and discomfort for users","Mitigation":"Incorporating ergonomic design principles, safety features, and accessibility standards","Technologies":"Smart sensors, safety alarms, adaptive lighting","People":"Users of built environments, especially those with mobility challenges","Owner":"Building designers, architects, and safety consultants"}]}
